articles.title: In a tense battle throughout, BU bests Northeastern in a shootout to advance to Beanpot final vs. BC
articles.description:
The two programs had combined to win the last seven Beanpots.

The post In a tense battle throughout, BU bests Northeastern in a shootout to advance to Beanpot final vs. BC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: BU defeated Northeastern in a shootout to reach the Beanpot final.
This marks the eighth consecutive Beanpot final for BU and Northeastern combined.
BU will face Boston College on February 6, 2026, impacting local college hockey rivalries.
